title: Small Town Secrets
description: EVERYONE DESERVES A SECOND CHANCE...Finally back on her feet after a nasty divorce from local cop Foley Blue, Lea Webster was getting ready to adopt the baby she'd always wanted. But Foley was stalking Lea and his once-idle threats were escalating to violence. Her cries for help went unheeded -- no one wanted to cross the town's favorite son.Then Zach MacKenzie moved in across the street, and Lea found herself irresistibly drawn to his protective strength and quiet faith. Yet Foley's jealousy built dangerously, threatening Zach's freedom and Lea's safety. And she had to wonder whether their newfound love -- and trust in each other -- would be enough to save them both.
author: Sharon Mignerey
